meanings.definition: The quality or state of being raucous or harsh in sound.
meanings.sent1: The raucity of the thunderstorm made me cover my ears.
meanings.sent2: The raucity of the car horns outside woke up the entire neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The raucity of the chirping birds in the morning was like a loud alarm clock.
meanings.sent4: The raucity of the wind howling through the trees sounded like a ghostly wail.
meanings.sent5: The raucity of the children playing in the park was a symphony of joyful noise.

meanings.sent1: The sudden raucity of the alarm clock startled me awake.
meanings.sent2: The raucity of the creaking floorboards echoed through the empty house.
meanings.sent3: The raucity of the old radio made it sound like it was singing along.
meanings.sent4: The raucity of the car engine was like a beast growling under the hood.
meanings.sent5: The raucity of the waves crashing against the shore was both soothing and powerful.
